Classes/SherpaViewController.html#/s:6Sh.name: articleKey
Classes/SherpaViewController.html#/s:6Sh.abstract: Key matching an article to be displayed.

Classes/SherpaViewController.html#/s:6Sh.name: contains(articleForKey:)
Classes/SherpaViewController.html#/s:6Sh.abstract: Determine if an article matching the given key is available.

Classes/SherpaViewController.html#/s:6Sh.name: open(articleForKey:animated:)

Classes/SherpaViewController.html#/s:6Sh.abstract: Opens a screen for composing an email to the address from the document at the given fileURL.
